PathOfBuilding.Notes:
^xE05030^xE05030With 3 curses : ^xC8C8C8 ^x70FF70Curse order:^7 - aura (always active) - selfcast - vixen3 (alchemist) - vixen2 (removed) - vixen1 (removed) ^x70FF70Then cascade:^7 - aura (always active) - vixen2 - vixen1 - selfcast (removed) - vixen3 (removed) (alchemist)
So alchemist can't proc if you have spell cascade, doesn't matter which socket it's in, the two other vixen curses will push it out
^xE05030^xE05030With 3 curses without cascade : ^xC8C8C8 ^x70FF70Curse order:^7 - aura (always active) - selfcast - vixen3 (alchemist) - vixen2 (removed) - vixen1 (removed) ^x70FF70Then 2nd cast:^7 - aura (always active) - vixen3 (alchemist) - vixen2 - vixen1 (removed) - selfcast (removed)
Is worse than 4 max curses.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
^xE05030^xE05030With 4 curses with cascade : ^x70FF70Curse order:^7 - aura (always active) - selfcast - vixen3 (alchemist) - vixen2 - vixen1 (removed) ^x70FF70Then cascade:^7 - aura (always active) - vixen2 - vixen1 - selfcast - vixen3 (removed) (alchemist)
Therefore this does not proc impending doom. You need to cast a 2nd time.
^xE05030^xE05030With 4 curses without cascade : ^x70FF70Curse order:^7 - aura (always active) - selfcast - vixen3 (alchemist) - vixen2 - vixen1 (removed) ^x70FF70Then self-cast again:^7 - aura (always active) - vixen3 (alchemist) - vixen2 - vixen1 - selfcast (removed)
Works on the 2nd cast, but can't use alchemist + cascade. Need to gem swap it for it to proc
